page.title: 12CAPELI LLANNEFYDD CHAPELS
page.content: Mae pump capel yn yr ardal ond mae un wedi cau erbyn hyn. Capeli'r Methodis- tiaid Calfinaidd yw capeli{Cefn Berain (a.1854),{Ffynhonnau}(a.1795) a {Llannefydd}(a.1866) a chapel Bedyddwyr Albanaidd yw{Bryn Deunydd}(a.1905).Mae Ysgol Sul a dau wasanaeth bob Sul yng Nghefn Berain a Llannefydd ac un bob Sul ym Mryn Deunydd a Ffynhonnau. Cymraeg yw iaith y gwasannaethau. There are five chapels in the district but one was closed a few years ago. Three of the chapels are Calvanistic Methodist,namely{Cefn Berain}(b.1854), {Ffynhonnau}(b.1795) and{Llannefydd (b.1866);{Bryn Deunydd}(b.1905) is a Scottish Baptist chapel. There are two services and a Sunday School held each Sunday at Llannefydd and Cefn Berain and one service held at Bryn Deunydd and Ffynhonnau.All the services are held in Welsh.
